rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space that integrates with the front facade. Vastu suggests positioning entrances in the northeast or east side.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan area adjacent to the kitchen and dining area. It is designed for natural lighting from the south facing windows.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Connected to the living room, optimally placed near the kitchen for convenience and Vastu harmony.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped modern kitchen located on the southern side to benefit from sunlight. Proper ventilation is ensured with large windows.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Largest bedroom placed in the northwest corner for a peaceful environment as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom placed on the northeast side to promote restful sleep with good airflow.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Third bedroom designed as a flexible space that could serve as guest room or home office. Positioned in the east for balanced energy.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Main bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom with modern fixtures and ventilation considerations.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed to welcome positive energy as per Vastu. The door is centered on the fa√ßade.
Provides access to a two-car garage space. Positioned according to local building norms and safety codes.

vastu_considerations: Entrance placed in the northeast or east for inviting positive energy.
Living spaces oriented towards south and west to maximize sunlight.
Bedrooms strategically located for balanced energy flow.
